definition_zh: 通过发汗使表邪随汗而解的治疗原则
definition_en: A therapeutic principle of eliminating exterior pathogen through inducing sweating

definition_zh: 通过清热药物清除体内热邪的治疗原则
definition_en: A therapeutic principle of eliminating heat pathogen using heat-clearing herbs
has_synonym_en: Heat-clearing and fire-purging;Clear heat and drain fire
